title: Lost Girls
description: Rachel went to bed curled up in her grammy’s quilt, worrying about her Geometry test and next week’s ballet lesson…and woke up in a ditch, bloodied, bruised, and missing a year of her life.She doesn’t recognize the person she’s become: She’s popular. She wears nothing but black.And she can fight.She’s not the only girl to go missing in the last year, but she is the only one to come back. She desperately wants to unravel what happened to her, to try and recover the rest of the Lost Girls.But the more she discovers, the more her memories return. And the thrill of what she remembers—of what she can’t resist—might still get her killed.
author: Merrie Destefano
